amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 118-456 to modify the definition of electronic communication service provider under section 702.
amendment.purpose: Amendment modifies the definition of electronic communication service provider under section 702, procedures for targeting certain persons outside the United States other than United States persons.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 186 (Roll no. 118).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 186 (Roll no. 118).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
